column1: The Purple Pig////With such a crowded space and crazy long wait lines we were nervous about how the service would be
column2: would we wait 30 minutes for drinks and then another 40 for appetizers? Nope
column3: when we sat our waiter went over the specials. He was a little pushy on the special as he noted they change them every hour and this one they only had 3 left so we had to order it at this exact moment. It was a fried blue crab dish and yea it was AMAZING. Nonetheless
column5: our drinks came out expeditiously and so did our food!
